To: nbwrpg@egroups.com

Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"

From: Yanshosh@...

::Zardus::

The doors of the Alliance base's bridge slide open, Zardus entering. He 
glances at a screen as he takes his seat at the command chair, noting that 
the defences were in bad shape. He frowns, looking at another screen.

Leaning forward, the Alliance commander types a command on the console, 
reading flashing across the screen. It was a report of what the scanners had 
picked up from the Predacon attacks on the Cybertronian Fire. Zardus' frown 
deepens as he sees the readings from the attack. The Cybertronian Fire was a 
mighty ship, stronger than the Alliance base, there was no doubt of that. 
They were also in a better position than the Alliance base.

Zardus activates his comm-link. He didn't like being in charge of a 
second-class base.

"All bots," he says into it, sending the transmission to all Alliance units, 
"Return to base. There is some remodeling to be done."

Zardus pushes several more buttons, a view of the Alliance base and 
surrounding area coming up on the screen.
